page.title: 07BLACK MOOR FARM
page.content: who let it to tennant farmers, including Joseph Coldwell, who moved to the Hall in 1905. He was obviously a man of standing in the community as he was on the foundung board of Greenmoor School(now closed). The hall is now owned and farmed by Mr. B Fox. {BLACK MOOR FARM } Blackmoor farm has 240 acres of mixed arable, and Dairy and Beef cattle. There are 50 milk cows, 100 beef cattle, 3 horses(not working), 1 dig and 9 cats. the milking parlour was put in about 10 years ago, and we get about 100 gallons of milk a day all year round. The cows calf betwwen september and april. There is 1 Hereford bull. 3 people work on the farm and there are 90 acres of Barley, 6 acres of potatoes, the remainder is grass for silage and grazing. 1/3 of the farm was enclosed in 1739 (cont)
